objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='#1E2D54'/><defs><linearGradient id='goldGradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#D4AF37'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#9B7D2D'/></linearGradient><radialGradient id='circleGlow' cx='50%' cy='50%' r='50%' gradientUnits='userSpaceOnUse'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#D4AF37' stop-opacity='0.2'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#1E2D54' stop-opacity='0'/></radialGradient></defs><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='320' fill='#FFF' stroke='url(#goldGradient)' stroke-width='5'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='340' fill='none' stroke='url(#goldGradient)' stroke-width='2' stroke-dasharray='10,5'/><circle cx='840' cy='400' r='120' fill='url(#goldGradient)'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='400' fill='url(#circleGlow)'/><g opacity='0.15'><circle cx='150' cy='200' r='5' fill='#D4AF37'/><circle cx='200' cy='150' r='3' fill='#D4AF37'/><circle cx='900' cy='150' r='4' fill='#D4AF37'/><circle cx='850' cy='200' r='6' fill='#D4AF37'/><circle cx='150' cy='900' r='4' fill='#D4AF37'/><circle cx='200' cy='850' r='6' fill='#D4AF37'/><circle cx='900' cy='850' r='3' fill='#D4AF37'/><circle cx='850' cy='900' r='5' fill='#D4AF37'/></g><g opacity='0.2'><line x1='100' y1='200' x2='200' y2='100' stroke='#D4AF37' stroke-width='1'/><line x1='880' y1='200' x2='980' y2='100' stroke='#D4AF37' stroke-width='1'/><line x1='100' y1='880' x2='200' y2='980' stroke='#D4AF37' stroke-width='1'/><line x1='880' y1='880' x2='980' y2='980' stroke='#D4AF37' stroke-width='1'/></g><path d='M200 540 Q 250 490, 300 540' stroke='#D4AF37' stroke-width='2' fill='none' opacity='0.3'/><path d='M780 540 Q 830 590, 880 540' stroke='#D4AF37' stroke-width='2' fill='none' opacity='0.3'/></svg>

product_details.description: Quartz Movement 20mm Case Diameter Mineral Crystal Water resistant to 50M Country of Origin - China **

banner_details:
This banner showcases a luxurious, vintage-themed watch advertisement. The background features a dark navy blue base with subtle diagonal elements and radial gradients creating a sense of depth. A prominent circular frame in the center uses golden linear and radial gradients to highlight the product (a golden digital wristwatch), placed centrally. The bold heading (id: **heading**) at the top uses a futuristic sans-serif font in gold to evoke sophistication. A smaller, white subheading (id: **subheading**) follows underneath to announce the product line. The pricing (id: **price**) is highlighted over a circular golden badge to the right. Below the product image, a feature description (id: **description**) appears in white, using separator dots. At the bottom, a gold rectangular call-to-action button (id: **cta_background** and **cta**) with bold blue text prompts the user to shop. The overall design blends modern digital and vintage aesthetics.

**Color Palette:**
- Navy Blue: `#1E2D54`
- Gold Gradient: `#D4AF37` to `#9B7D2D`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases a vintage-style Casio digital watch primarily in metallic gold tones. The dominant color is a rich brushed gold (#D4AF37) used throughout the band and casing, symbolizing luxury and sophistication. The watch face features a slightly muted, matte beige-gold background (#E0C878), creating a subtle contrast to the shinier metallic components. Black (#000000) is used for the text and digital display, offering sharp clarity and bold emphasis. Together, these hues form a high-impact palette, blending luxury and readability. For advertisement banners, complementary deep maroon (#4B1E1E) or sleek charcoal gray (#2C2C2C) can add depth while enhancing elegance and readability.
